item.title: Data Science Terminology
item.description: HUGOMORE42 Data Science Terminology Based upon personal experience, research, and various industry expertsâ€™ advice, someone delving into the art of data science should take every opportunity to understand and gain experience as well as proficiency with the following list of common data science terms: Statistical population Statistical population as a recordset (or a set of records). This set or group of records will be of similar items or events that are of interest to the data scientist for some experiment.
